titleStmt.title: A generall martyrologie containing a collection of all the greatest persecutions which have befallen the church of Christ from the creation to our present times, both in England and other nations : whereunto are added two and twenty lives of English modern divines ... : as also the life of the heroical Admiral of France slain in the partisan massacre and of Joane Queen of Navar poisoned a little before / by Sa. Clarke.
titleStmt.author: Clarke, Samuel, 1599-1682.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, corrected and enlarged, having the two late persecutions inserted, the one in Piemont, the other in Poland.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Ratcliffe for Thomas Underhill and John Rothwell,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
